mapper.select:
SELECT rownum as SEQ, e.* FROM ( select JJR_DocNo, to_char(JJR_RCDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as JJR_RCDate, JJR_JRType, JJR_JRNo, MAI_TeamNo, fn_getDptName(MAI_TeamNo) as DptName, MAI_VvrmNo, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, BAA_AniCode, MAC_Name, MAI_BName, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as SexName, JJR_Cmnt, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(300, 301, JJR_RCSts) as JJR_RCSts FROM JN_JINRYO_RC, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MAI_VvrmNo = MVI_VvrmNo AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJR_DocNo = BAA_DocNo
AND JJR_JRType = #{jinryoKind}
AND JJR_RCSts = #{jinryoStatus}
AND MAC_Name LIKE '%' || #{nameKeyword} || '%'
AND JJR_JRNO LIKE '%' || #{numKeyword} || '%'
AND MVI_VVRMNAME LIKE '%' || #{vvrmKeyword} || '%'
AND JJR_RCDate >= to_date(#{cal_1},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND JJR_RCDate <= to_date(#{cal_2} || '23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY JJR_RCDate ) e

select JJR_DocNo, to_char(nvl(JJR_RCDate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJR_RCDate, JJR_JRType, JJR_JRNo, BAA_AniCode, JJR_Cmnt, JJR_RCSts, FN_GETDPTNAME(MUI_TEAMNO) as DPTINFO, JJR_USERID, MUI_NAME from JN_JINRYO_RC, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_USER_INFO where MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode and MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode and JJR_DocNo = BAA_DocNo and MUI_ID = JJR_UserID
and JJR_DocNo = #{value}
select MVI_VvrmNo, MVI_VvrmName, MVI_TeamNo from MF_VVRM_INFO order by MVI_VvrmName

select MAI_AniCode, MAI_AniClsCode, MAI_BName, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as SexName, MAI_VvrmNo, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, MAI_Birthday, MAC_Name, MAC_EName, to_char(nvl(DAIO_IODate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place, CASE WHEN MAI_Birthday IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday)/12) || '년 ' || TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday) - TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday)/12) * 12) || '개월' ELSE '' END AS CURAGE from MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO where DAIO_IOType = '1' and rownum <= 1 order by DAIO_IODate desc ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode where MAI_AniCode = #{value} and MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode
mapper.insert: insert into JN_JINRYO_RC(JJR_DocNo, JJR_RCDate, JJR_UserID, JJR_JRType, JJR_JRNo, JJR_Cmnt, JJR_RCSts, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) values(#{DOCNO}, to_date(#{RCDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{USERID}, #{JRType}, '', #{CMNT}, '0', 'N',SYSDATE,'TREAT0402',#{USERID},SYSDATE,'TREAT0402',#{USERID})

insert into BZ_ANI_ATCH ( BAA_DocNo, BAA_BzCls1, BAA_BzCls2, BAA_BzCls3, BAA_AniCode, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) values(#{DOCNO}, 'JY', 'N', 'N', #{ANICODE}, 'N', SYSDATE,'TREAT0402',#{USERID},SYSDATE,'TREAT0402',#{USERID})
mapper.update: update JN_JINRYO_RC set JJR_RCSts='1', CMN_DEL_STS='N', CMN_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG='TREAT0402', CMN_UPD_ID=#{USERID} where JJR_DocNo = #{DOCNO}
update JN_JINRYO_RC set JJR_JRType=#{JRTYPE}, JJR_Cmnt=#{CMNT}, CMN_DEL_STS='N', CMN_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG='TREAT0402', CMN_UPD_ID=#{USERID} where JJR_DocNo = #{DOCNO}
